classification.task_goal: Estimate additional survival time for patients based on a Cox proportional hazards model.
primary_constraints: Provide a unique estimated time considering the weight (probability of survival beyond a specific time point).
Handle NA values in median survival times appropriately.
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially provided estimates without addressing NA values in median times and did not calculate a unique estimated time based on survival probabilities. The user pointed out these issues, prompting the assistant to revise the code to handle NA values and calculate a weighted average survival time.
